title: Jordan Throws Out First Pitch at Fenway

content.text: Jordan Alexander Spieth was born on July 27, 1993, in Dallas, Texas. The first of three children of father Shawn, a former college baseball player who founded a media analytics startup, and mom Chris, a college basketball player turned computer engineer, Jordan inherited his parents' athletic capabilities. He grew up playing soccer, baseball, football and basketball, with golf eventually taking precedence in the pecking order.
